title: How A Colourful Renovation Gave This Red-Brick Home A Whole New Vibe
description: You’d be forgiven for thinking Un Peu Perrault is a new build, but in fact, only a very small part of this vibrant family home in Canberra was newly constructed. The rest is the product of a creative renovation by MYMYMY Architecture, who aimed to achieve ‘maximise impact’ with minimal structural changes to the existing structure. Bold swatches of contrasting colours, warm materials, and a contemporary colonnade — inspired by Claude Perrault’s architectural addition to the Louvre Museum in Paris — have given the tired red-brick house a fun new feel.
author: The Design Files
